author: Priya Sharma
review: Excellent packers and movers in Pune! DSL Express team arrived on time in Wakad. Packing was professional – no damage to my TV or glass items. Safe shifting from Wakad to Hinjewadi. Highly recommend for local moves.

author: Rahul Mehta
review: Used DSL Express for office relocation in Hinjewadi. Good coordination, but slight delay due to traffic. Furniture packed well. Affordable rates for packers and movers in Pune.

author: Anita Desai
review: Best packers and movers in Baner! Shifted 2BHK without any breakage. Team was polite and efficient. Car transport from Pune to Mumbai was smooth. Will use again.

author: Vikram Singh
review: Average experience. Packing quality was okay, but one box was damaged. Customer support resolved it. Need better bubble wrap for fragile items in Kothrud moves.

author: Neha Kapoor
review: Trusted packers and movers in Pune. Moved from Aundh to Bangalore – everything arrived safely. Bike transport was secure. Transparent pricing, no hidden charges.

author: Amit Patel
review: Super fast service! Same-day shifting in Viman Nagar. Professional team, clean truck. Best for urgent packers and movers in Pune.

author: Sonia Reddy
review: Good for premium packing. Used foam and crates for antiques. Minor delay in loading. Overall satisfied with Koregaon Park to Hadapsar move.

author: Karan Joshi
review: Budget-friendly packers and movers in Pimpri. Shifted 1BHK under ₹6000. No damage, timely delivery. Recommended for students.

author: Ritu Malhotra
review: Not happy. Team was late by 3 hours. One sofa leg broken. Poor communication. Avoid for Magarpatta moves.

author: Deepak Nair
review: Outstanding! Handled my fish tank with care. Waterproof packing. Best packers and movers in Wakad for delicate items.

author: Pooja Gupta
review: Corporate relocation done perfectly. IT equipment packed in anti-static bags. Zero downtime. Top choice for Hinjewadi office moves.

author: Rajesh Kumar
review: Good value. Included insurance. Minor scratch on fridge, but compensated. Reliable packers and movers in Baner.

author: Meera Iyer
review: Eco-friendly packing materials! Used recycled boxes. Smooth move from Kharadi to Delhi. Appreciate the green initiative.

author: Arjun Verma
review: Okay service. Truck was old. Packing speed good, but unloading messy. Average for Pashan to Viman Nagar shift.

author: Shalini Bose
review: Amazing team! Helped disassemble/reassemble furniture. No extra charges. Best packers and movers in Hadapsar.

author: Nikhil Rao
review: Used for bike transport Pune to Hyderabad. Scratch-free delivery. GPS tracking provided. Highly trusted.

author: Tanya Singh
review: Good for small moves. 1RK shifted in 2 hours. Packing could be tighter for books. Satisfied overall.

author: Rohan Desai
review: Professional and punctual. Live tracking app. Safe shifting of piano. Top packers and movers in Aundh.

author: Kavya Menon
review: Luxury packing for artwork. Climate-controlled truck. Perfect for high-value items in Koregaon Park.

author: Sameer Khan
review: 24/7 support. Night shifting done smoothly. Best for IT professionals in Hinjewadi. Thank you DSL Express!
